youtube.title: How Urine Is Produced: The Biological Process Explained
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating biological process of how urine is produced in the human body. From the circulatory system to the kidneys and nephrons, learn how your body filters blood and removes waste. Perfect for students and science enthusiasts! #biology #science #humanbody
